properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 11:39PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Little River near Woodstock affecting Cherokee County

Shoal Creek near Sharpsburg affecting Coweta County

Line Creek near Below Lake McIntosh affecting Coweta and Fayette
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Little River near Woodstock.
* From this evening until further notice.
* At 11 PM Tuesday the stage was 11.2 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* At 11 feet...Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in
the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage at
Old Georgia Highway 5. A public boat ramp just downstream and on
the right bank from the bridge will be under one foot of water. Low
lying areas of the South Cherokee Recreation Park and the soccer
fields off Druw Cameron Drive will begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
